methods.description: Returns the current location for the device

parameters.description: Minimum precision required to obtain the location, in meters
parameters.name: minAccuracy

parameters.description: Maximum time to wait in seconds, to obtain the desired accuracy
parameters.name: timeout

parameters.description: Indicates if it is necessary to include the heading and speed information
parameters.name: includeHeadingAndSpeed

parameters.description: If set to true, following actions in a composite block will be executed, regardless of the execution status of this method
parameters.name: ignoreErrors

methods.name: GetMyLocation
